title: Sentiment Analysis & Visualization
description: Implemented web scraping for Amazon product reviews, conducted sentiment analysis using Microsoft Azure's Text Analytics API, and visualized insights for product strategy.

title: Client Default Risk Prediction
description: Built a predictive model using Logistic Regression in R to assess client default risks, achieving a 20% reduction in false positives.

title: SQL Database Optimization
description: Optimized an e-commerce SQL database using normalization techniques and indexing, reducing latency by 40%.
